## OptimisticHttpRequestPayload interface

Represents an action payload used to make an optimistic http request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OptimisticHttpRequestPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [request](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequestpayload.request.md) | [OptimisticHttpRequest](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.md) | The request that should be sent |
|  [stateSnapshot](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequestpayload.statesnapshot.md) | Immutable&lt;{}&gt; | A snapshot that is used to revert state in case of errors. |
